question: Which Indian shooter has bagged gold in the Women’s 10m Air Pistol at the ISSF Junior World Rifle/Pistol Championship?
explanation: Yashaswini Singh Deswal from Chandigarh has bagged gold in the  Women’s 10m Air Pistol competition at the International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF) Junior World Rifle/Pistol Championship in Suhl, Germany. Beside her, Anish Bhanwala  has clinched gold in the Men’s 25m Standard Pistol competition in the championship.
